mapper.select: select * from savings_info order by kor_co_nm

select no, to_char(dcls_month, 'YYYY-MM') as dcls_month, fin_co_no, kor_co_nm, fin_prdt_cd, fin_prdt_nm, join_way, mtrt_int, spcl_cnd, join_deny, join_member, etc_note, max_limit, to_char(dcls_strt_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dcls_strt_day, to_char(dcls_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dcls_end_day, to_char(fin_co_subm_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') as fin_co_subm_day from savings_info where no=#{no}
select ipv6 from savings_log where to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.insert: insert into savings_info values(savings_info_seq.nextval, to_date(#{dclsMonth},'YYYY/MM'),#{finCoNo},#{korCoNm},#{finPrdtCd},#{finPrdtNm},#{joinWay},#{mtrtInt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{spclCnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{joinDeny, jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{joinMember, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{etcNote, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{maxLimit, jdbcType=NUMERIC},to_date(#{dclsStrtDay, jdbcType=DATE},'YYYY/MM/DD'),to_date(#{dclsEndDay},'YYYY/MM/DD'),to_date(#{finCoSubmDay},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select FIN_PRDT_NM from savings_info where no=#{no}

select si.no as no, replace(si.fin_prdt_nm, chr(13)||chr(10), ' ') as name, count from (select product_no, count(*) as count from consult_product group by type, product_no having type = 2 order by count desc, product_no desc) join savings_info si on (si.no = product_no) where rownum <= 5
